entry.title: $2395 // Charming 1BR located in the heart of UES
entry.content:
Hello,

I am looking for someone to take over my lease with the option to renew the lease in the Fall.

The management company would facilitate the lease take over just like a regular lease signing. They have required paper work, collect security etc. I run a business in Westchester and the commute has just become too much. I love my little apartment but I hardly am there anymore.

Here is a little bit about the apartment:

- Located on 81st Street between 2nd and 3rd - so many great restaurants and stores just steps from the apartment. To the East is the East River and Carl Shurz Park + running esplanade, and to the West is Central Park, The Met and Madison Avenue. With-in blocks to 4-5-6-Q trains. Wholefoods (my fave) is 5 blocks away. Entrance onto FDR takes minutes.
- Small Kitchen over looking the Living Room (this was a selling point for me) I like the flow of that. There is room for a small table and two chairs in the kitchen area in front of a window - not a view window but it looks nice :)
- GREAT LIGHTING + WINDOWS the Living Room has wonderful lighting, when I moved in I was working from home a lot so this was a huge deal for me, I love the big windows and sun.
- Small but functional kitchen - Counter Fridge, Full Gas Range and Oven, Large Micro and Sink. Decent cabinet space.
- Bedroom is small. I am able to fit my full bed and dresser. 1 Closet with storage space above. Luckily us New Yorkers don't spend a lot of time in our bedrooms :)
- Bathroom is in great condition and functional layout. Bathtub/Shower. Big Mirror. Great Lighting.
- Extra Storage Closet in Hallway Next to doorway to Apt. This has come in huge, I keep bins of off season clothes, cleaning supplies, travel luggage etc.
- This is a no elevator building - so there are 3 flights of stairs, but that has also been my excuse not to go to the gym :) Its actually not so bad.
- I always find parking on or near my street.
- Laundry Mat right under our building. Great people.
- Overall - I love the building, its in great condition (new windows, polished floors, clean appliances etc), attentive super and management office, quiet (!) neighbors, so close to subways, restaurants, shops etc.

Serious inquiries only. Looking for someone to start 2/15, 3/1 or 3/15
Happy to show apartment to those who are seriously considering.
